title: Abdicate - Forged In Ruin  mp3  VBR  Metal     2009
description:
Abdicate - Forged In Ruin  mp3    Metal  2009 What we got Brutal Slammin Death Metal......Abdicate is a brutal death metal band from Rochester, New York. They formed in 2007 by Yeti (Vocals) , Brian (Guitars), Lewis (Guitars) , Rich (Bass) and Alex (Drums).

They play straight forward brutal death metal with low comphrensible growls notable to Suffocation, sludgy guitars and mid paced to blasting drums.There influnces range and some of their songs, particulary the new material, sound alot like guttural slamming death metal oreientated.

Their main influences are Dying Fetus, Decrepit Birth, Flesh Consumed, Exhumed, Cannibal Corpse and Gorguts  They released a full-length on Severed Records called 'Relinquish the Throne' in 2008.
